title: Can't gift bundles to a friend?
body: I'm trying to gift my friend the Elementalist Lux bundle but I dont see the option for that, just the basic skin. Is there a way  to do it? I'm on the new client.

replies.body:
Unfortunately, Bundles have never been giftable. The best way to gift *all of the content* is to Gift just the skin, then gift the remaining RP so your friend can purchase the rest of the bundle (discounted of course) so they can rock all the Elementalist things!

Check out [**Gifting Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752964-Gifting-Guide-and-FAQ) for more information. Let me know if you have any questions.
